column5: Beautifully decorated and fully furnished apartment in a family oriented neighborhood with community club house and community swimming pool.   Walking distance to Kroger and the plaza where your daily needs are met and hardly a mile from Walmart.  Easy access to 75 and 121 for traveling anywhere in Dallas Metroplex.   As a host, we intend to provide you the best experience of living in a home away from your home whether you are on a business or pleasure trip in Dallas Metroplex.
